title: Corruption of Spirit (Chat & Communication)
content: Words, sounds, and messages shape the atmosphere of Mysterria. Whether you speak in Minecraft chat, Discord, or private DMs, keep them clean and respectful.

title: Toxicity & Harassment
content: Flaming, bullying, or harassing others is not allowed. This includes constant arguing to provoke people, personal insults, and targeting someone repeatedly. Example: calling someone trash every time they speak = warnable offense.

title: Swearing & Vulgarity
content: Mild swearing is fine, but excessive profanity, sexual jokes, or constant foul language are not. Example: saying 'damn' in frustration is okay, spamming f-bombs or sexual comments is not.

title: Spam & Noise
content: Do not spam chat or flood voice channels. This includes repeating the same message, mic spamming, or abusing soundboards. Example: spamming 'ez' in chat or blasting loud noises in VC = punishable.

title: Private Harassment
content: Harassing people in DMs (Minecraft or Discord) counts just the same as public harassment. Example: sending 20 messages to annoy someone after they told you to stop = warn.

title: Names & Avatars
content: Nicknames, avatars, or skins with offensive, extremist, or NSFW content are forbidden. Example: Nazi skins, hentai profile pics, or racist usernames = instant action by staff.

title: Profane Creations (Builds & World Behavior)
content: What you create in Mysterria must not harm others or the world itself.

title: Offensive Builds & Content
content: No extremist symbols, sexual structures, or other offensive builds. Example: swastikas, inappropriate statues, or extremist banners = instant removal + punishment.

title: Griefing & Stealing
content: Breaking builds, stealing items, or trolling others without consent is forbidden. Example: destroying a house or taking chest loot that isn’t yours = punishable.

title: Lag & Exploit Machines
content: Machines or farms that cause lag (like TNT spam) or unauthorized chunk loaders are not allowed. Example: building a redstone clock to crash the server = ban.

title: Forbidden Powers (Cheats & Exploits)
content: Unfair advantages break the balance of Mysterria. Cheating is never tolerated.

title: Hacks & Cheats
content: Using hacks, x-ray, autoclickers, macros, dupes, or bug exploits is an instant permanent ban. Example: x-ray mining for diamonds = permaban.

title: Bug Abuse
content: If you find a glitch, report it. Do not abuse it. Example: finding a way to duplicate items and using it = permaban.

title: Veil & Identity (Privacy & Accounts)
content: Respect real-world privacy and keep your account tied to your own soul.

title: Privacy & Doxxing
content: Never share personal info (real names, addresses, social media, etc.). Example: leaking someone’s Instagram without permission = instant permaban.

title: Outside Influence
content: Don’t use Discord/DMs to manipulate in-game actions unfairly (metagaming). Example: telling your friend over Discord to ambush someone’s base = punishable.

title: Alt Accounts
content: Only one account per person unless approved by staff. Unauthorized alts = permaban. Example: making a second account to avoid a mute = instant ban.

title: Impersonation
content: Do not impersonate staff or other players. Faking evidence or pretending to be a Guardian = permanent ban.

title: Respect of Souls (Community Behavior)
content: Mysterria thrives on respect. Treat others fairly and keep the community positive.

title: Hate Speech
content: Racism, sexism, homophobia, and other hate speech is forbidden. Example: using slurs = instant warn or ban depending on severity.

title: False Accusations
content: Making false reports against players or staff wastes time and spreads toxicity. Example: faking screenshots to get someone banned = punishable.

title: Disrespecting Staff
content: Guardians (staff) must be respected. Insulting or trolling staff directly = heavy punishment.

title: Drama & Negativity
content: Creating drama, spreading negativity, or constantly complaining ruins the atmosphere. Example: repeatedly saying 'this server sucks' = warnable offense.

title: Begging & Pestering
content: Do not spam staff for free items, ranks, or attention. Example: 'pls gimme op' every 5 minutes = punishable.

title: Ritual Order (Channels & Promotion)
content: Stay organized and respect how communication channels are used.

title: Stay On-Topic
content: Use the right channels for the right discussions. Example: posting memes in #announcements = warn.

title: Advertising
content: No advertising or promotion unless approved by staff. This includes other servers, Discords, or YouTube channels. Example: DMing players your server IP = ban.

title: Judgment of Guardians (Punishments)
content: Punishments are handled through the Warning Path. Some actions bypass it entirely.

title: The Warning Path
content: Each offense = 1 warning. Punishments double each time: mute, longer mute, tempban, longer tempban. 8 warnings = permanent ban. Warnings expire after 6 months.

title: Instant Permanent Bans
content: Some actions lead to instant permaban: hacking, dupes, bug abuse, doxxing, extremist symbols, NSFW builds. No second chances.

title: Final Authority
content: Staff decisions are final. No appeals, no exceptions.
